chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) was dismissed by the court.

  • Tod L Fawley was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Marathon County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Any vehicle T&R in defendants name, as is defendant himself.  IID to be installed within 14 days.

miscConds.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

Any assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by PO including AODA.  Defendant must be in full compliance with IID order and DL revocation order.  DNA sample.

with huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies.

Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CM1678, 15CM1516, 15TR4333 called: 2:55PM
State appears by ADA S.Brubacher; Defendant appears in person/in custody and with Attorney Amanda Ley.
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  

PLEA in 15CM1516>>
State moves to:
Ct. 2 (OAR)>>D&RI
COURT grants above
PLEA:
Ct. 1 (OWI 3rd)>>NO CONTEST
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held; 2 years Probation
CONDITIONS: $2450 inclusive of all costs; Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO including AODA; 160 days MCJ w/huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system, w/credit for 1 day of time already served; 3 year DL Rev w/credit; Any vehicles titled and registered in the defendant's name are ordered to have IID installed and IID is ordered on defendant him/herself, both for a period of 3 years; IID to be installed within 14 days; $50 IID surcharge to be paid; Half price IID as defendant qualifies; Defendant must be in full compliance with IID order and DL rev order as conditions of probation; AODA; DNA sample and surcharge (included in fine above); Absolute sobriety.


15CM1678>>
State moves for Leave of Court to file Amended Complaint - Atty Ley does not object; COURT GRANTS.
FILE 15CM1678 IS NOW RENUMBERED TO 15CF1091>>
Waiver of Prelim. filed in 15CF1091  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.

PLEA in 15CF1091>>
State moves to:
Ct. 2 (PAC 4th)>>DISMISS
Ct. 3 (OAR)>>D&RI
Ct. 4 (Misd BJ)>>D&RI
PLEA:
Ct. 1 (OWI 4th)>>NO CONTEST
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held; 2 years Probation, concurrent to 15CM1516
CONDITIONS: $2450 inclusive of all costs; Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO including AODA; 9 months MCJ, consecutive to 15CM1516, w/huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system, w/credit for 85 days of time already served; 3 year DL Rev w/credit; Any vehicles titled and registered in the defendant's name are ordered to have IID installed and IID is ordered on defendant him/herself, both for a period of 3 years; IID to be installed within 14 days; $50 IID surcharge to be paid; Half price IID as defendant qualifies; Defendant must be in full compliance with IID order and DL rev order as conditions of probation; AODA; DNA sample and surcharge (included in fine above); Absolute sobriety.
